power.title: Bastion of Defense
power.fluff: Your demeanor grows ever more encouraging, helping your allies keep up their morale

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following benefits:
When an ally in your aura starts his or her turn and can see and hear you, that ally gains temporary hit points equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
If the ally is bloodied, he or she instead regains that many hit points.

power.section: You gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of bloodied allies in the aura.

section.text: If you hit with an attack on your turn, you and allies in your aura have a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Calculated Assault
power.fluff: You prove your superior command of the situation

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, while the target ally is in your aura, he or she has a bonus to damage rolls equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
You can use a minor action to choose a different ally in your warlord's aura. If you do, that ally becomes the target for this benefit and the previous ally loses the benefit.

power.title: Concentrated Attack
power.fluff: You and your companions combine your attacks to deliver a nasty blow

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit an enemy with an attack on your turn, allies in your warlord's aura have a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

The first time a given ally hits the enemy, that ally can choose to either increase the power bonus by +1 or to end the bonus. If the ally chooses to end the bonus, he or she also gains the bonus to his or her damage roll.

power.title: Destructive Lead
power.fluff: You lead a foe to focus on yourself, then signal an ally to strike at just the right moment

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, when you make a melee attack on your turn, you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Also, you can use the Signal Destruction action at-will until the end of the encounter.

part.section: Trigger:An enemy marked by you makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target
Effect:The target makes a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

power.title: Expert Timing
power.fluff: You guide your comrades to take full advantage when an enemy staggers

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, enemies in your warlord's aura provoke reactive strikes when they end a pull, push, or slide. You or an ally cannot take the reactive strike if he or she is the source of the forced movement.

power.title: Lead the Attack
power.fluff: Under your instruction, arrows hit their marks and blades drive home

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, while the target enemy is in your aura, allies in your warlord's aura have a bonus to attack rolls against the target enemy. The bonus equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier (minimum bonus +1).
If you hit the target enemy with an attack on your turn, the bonus increases to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier (minimum +2 bonus) until the start of your next turn.
You can use the following action at-will until the end of the encounter:

power.section: Free Reaction:Trigger: The target enemy drops to 0 hit points or less; You choose a new enemy in your warlord's aura to become the target.

power.title: Orchestrated Offensive
power.fluff: You follow your strike with a signal to your allies, guiding them along the battle's coreography

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit with a basic attack on your turn, you can choose one or two allies in your warlord's aura. Until the end of your next turn, both allies have a benefit while they remain in your aura. Choose one of the following benefits; if you chose two allies, both gain the same benefit.
A power bonus to damage rolls equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
A bonus to attack rolls with triggered attacks equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
A bonus to all defenses against triggered attacks equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
A power bonus to all defenses equal to one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier. This increases to your full [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier if the ally is bloodied.

power.title: Pin the Foe
power.fluff: No matter where your foe turns, one of your allies is waiting for it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following effects:
Enemies in the aura cannot shift if either two of your allies or you and one of your allies are adjacent to it.
Allies in the aura have a bonus to melee damage rolls against enemies they flank. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Relentless Wounding
power.fluff: With firm commands, you guide your allies to focus their efforts

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following effects:
Allies in the aura who can see and hear you have a bonus to damage rolls against the target enemy. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier (minimum bonus +2).
If you hit the target enemy with an attack, the first attack an ally in the aura makes against it can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.
You can use the following action at-will until the end of the encounter:

power.section: Free Reaction: Trigger: The target enemy drops to 0 hit points or less; You choose a new enemy you can see within 10 squares to become the target.

power.title: White Raven Onslaught
power.fluff: You instruct your allies to overrun enemy defenses

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following effects:
Allies who either start or end a charge attack in the aura gain a +2 bonus to any attack rolls made as part of that charge.
If an ally misses a charge attack against a target in the aura and deals no damage on a miss, he or she deals one-half of the minimum damage that would have been dealt on a hit.
